# Schema

[vovk dev](/cli/vovk-dev) emits JSON files that contain information about endpoints, method names, validation, etc, defined at the controller to **.vovk-schema/** folder. Each **.json** file represents schema for one [segment](/segment). The schemas exported from auto-generated **.vovk-schema/index.js**. 

```js
// auto-generated
module.exports[''] = require('./_root.json');
module.exports['foo'] = require('./foo.json');
module.exports['bar/baz'] = require('./bar/baz.json');
```

```json
{
  // vovkInit option that defines is the schema going to be emitted for this segment
  "emitSchema": true,
  // Segment name
  "segmentName": "",
  // List of controllers as key-value pairs for fast access
  // Key is a name of the variable thst's going to be exported from "vovk-client"
  // Value is controller information
  "controllers": {
    "HelloRPC": {
      // RPC name that's going to be used in the client
      "controllerName": "HelloRPC",
      // Original name of the controller class
      "originalControllerName": "HelloController",
      // An argument of @prefix class decorator
      "prefix": "hello",
      // List of handlers as key-value pairs for fast access
      // Key is a static method name
      // Value is handler information
      "handlers": {
        "getHello": {
          // Endpoint that's concatenated with the prefix
          "path": "greeting",
          // HTTP method
          "httpMethod": "POST",
          // Validation for "body" and "query"
          // Can contain any custom data, at this case it's JSON schema emitted by "vovk-zod"
          "validation": {
            "body": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "foo": {
                    "type": "string"
                  }
                },
                "required": [
                  "foo"
                ],
                "additionalProperties": false,
                "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#"
            },
            "query": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "bar": {
                  "type": "string"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "bar"
              ],
              "additionalProperties": false,
              "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#"
            }
          },
          // Custom data that can be defined by a custom decorator
          "custom": {
            "hello": "World"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "workers": {
    "HelloWPC": {
      "workerName": "HelloWPC",
      "originalWorkerName": "HelloWorker",
      "handlers": {
        "factorize": {
            "isGenerator": true
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Check how to emit custom schema for "custom" key at [decorators documentation](/controller/decorator)
